description_for_human: Access FINOS databases (BrandBank, Messaging Themes, Personas, Milestones, Initiatives, Team & Governing Board, Company Record, Prompt Library). Query live row data, retrieve pages, and generate daily error reports.
description_for_model: Provides access to FINOS Notion databases. Use queryDatabase to fetch rows, retrievePage for full row content, and dailyReport for error/unknown property summaries.

functions.name: queryDatabase
functions.description: Query rows from a Notion database by database_id. Returns parsed and raw values.

database_id.description: The Notion database ID (e.g., BrandBank, Messaging Themes).

page_size.description: Number of rows to fetch. Defaults to 1.

functions.name: retrievePage
functions.description: Retrieve all properties from a single Notion page by page_id. Returns parsed and raw values.

page_id.description: The Notion page ID to retrieve.

functions.name: dailyReport
functions.description: Retrieve a daily report of all issues, unknown property types, and errors encountered when parsing FINOS Notion databases.
